title: How to Open Mobi Files on PC or Mac

steps.title: FBReader is a free MOBI reader that's easy to install on Windows and macOS.
steps.content: FBReader is a free MOBI reader that's easy to install on Windows and macOS. You can use this app to read any MOBI file. Here's how to download it: Go to https://fbreader.org in your web browser. If you're using a Mac, click Download on the App Store and follow the on-screen instructions. On Windows, click Get it from Microsoft and follow the on-screen instructions.

steps.title: Now that FBReader is installed, you'll find it in your app list.
steps.content: Now that FBReader is installed, you'll find it in your app list. If you're using Windows, it'll be in your Start menu. On a Mac, you'll find it in the Applications folder and on the Launchpad.

steps.title: You'll see this plus sign icon in the upper-left corner of FBReader.
steps.content: You'll see this plus sign icon in the upper-left corner of FBReader. It will open a pop-up window, and allow you to select an ebook to add.

steps.title: This will open the Book Info settings in a new pop-up window.
steps.content: This will open the Book Info settings in a new pop-up window. This window allows you to set your preferences before importing the ebook.

steps.title: Select your language, title, encoding, and other preferences before clicking OK.
steps.content: Select your language, title, encoding, and other preferences before clicking OK . This will add the selected Mobi file to your FBReader library and open the ebook.
